title: Prison Health Care Governance: Guaranteeing Clinical Independence

affiliation.name: At the time of writing, Jörg Pont was a consultant on health care in detention Vienna, Austria. Stefan Enggist is with the Swiss Federal Office of Public Health, Bern, Switzerland. Heino Stöver is with the University of Applied Sciences, Faculty of Health and Social Work, Frankfurt am Main, Germany. Brie Williams is with the Division of Geriatrics, University of California, San Francisco. Robert Greifinger is a consultant on health care in detention, New York, NY. Hans Wolff is with the Division of...
